701131469670503.title: Director, Marketing Insights, WhatsApp
701131469670503.responsibilities: Harness comprehensive, best-in-class quant and qual research solutions to identify core audience truths and translate them into actionable insights and executions. Partner with marketing, comms and product organizations to understand user needs and product use cases, define product positioning, develop audience understanding, and shape marketing strategies. Help WhatsApp marketing programs achieve success against their business objectives while maximizing impact, efficiency and user value operate as a full-stack partner across planning, execution, and measurement/optimization to maximize the ROI of our investments. Communicate effectively and strategically with stakeholders at all levels of the business to inform decision-making and drive alignment. Hire and develop an effective team of marketing researchers.
701131469670503.minimum_qualifications: 12+ years experience leading marketing or product research teams, deep executional knowledge of qualitative and quantitative methods and their applications in a business context Expertise leading insights-driven marketing campaigns/product launches from definition to execution, shaping strategy, driving alignment/decision-making, and delivering business outcomes Outstanding problem-solving and ability to quickly move from blank state to well-defined problem and a suitable approach Effective communication skills and a track record of creating alignment/clarity among disparate stakeholders and ambiguous contexts Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, drive change, and collaborate effectively with a variety of partners Strong manager skills to create an empowered and effective team with opportunities for impact, growth and development
701131469670503.preferred_qualifications: 5+ years experience in a consumer technology, with in-depth knowledge on how to build/implement effective and scalable marketing programs Strong working knowledge of digital and growth marketing with a focus on acquisition, engagement, and retention Clear examples of developing highly differentiated and durable brand positionings which inform product roadmaps and global marketing campaigns Innovation mindset with a focus on applying AI to marketing research project execution, reporting, and program recommendations
701131469670503.compensation: $233,000/year to $304,000/year + bonus + equity + benefits Individual compensation is determined by skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
